Reviews.Title: Powerful, light, fast, silent, stylish
Reviews.Author: Sergio
Reviews.Content: Very powerful and fast laptop. Extremely thin and light. Very silent, even during hard jobs.It comes with Windows 7, which is a bonus for me (not really interested in W8), and it does not have a touchscreen, which makes it a bit cheaper.The only weak point is the keyboard, looks a bit fragile, feels "cheap". Other than that one really has the impression that this is a really high-end laptop.It includes a dongle for RJ45 port (ethernet), so you don't have to worry about it.It does NOT include the dongle for VGA, nor HDMI (although it has a Mini HDMI port). You may want to consider purchasing those.

ProductInfo.Features: Ativ Book 9 - Intel Core I7-4500U - 256Gb Ssd - 8Gb Ddr3 - 13.3 Led - Intel Hd G
ProductInfo.Name: ATIV Book 9 NP900X3G 13.3" LED (SuperBright) Ultrabook - Intel Core i7 i7-4500U 1.80 GHz - Ash Black
